query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pesquisas) as total_pesquisas,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as clientes_com_pesquisa,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as mercados_com_pesquisa,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM produtos WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as produtos_com_pesquisa,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as concorrentes_com_pesquisa,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE pesquisaId = 1) as leads_com_pesquisa;
